temples.name: Mesa Arizona Temple
temples.address: 101 S LeSueur Mesa AZ 85204-1031 United States
temples.services: Clothing rental available, No cafeteria available, No patron housing available, Distribution center nearby
temples.history: The Mesa Arizona Temple is the seventh operating temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Located in the city of Mesa, Arizona, it is the first of six LDS temples built or planned in the state. (Information from Wikipedia)

temples.name: San Diego California Temple
temples.address: 7474 Charmant Dr San Diego CA 92122-5000 United States
temples.services: Clothing rental available No cafeteria available No patron housing available Distribution center nearby
temples.history: The San Diego California Temple is the 47th constructed and 45th operating temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Located near the La Jolla community of San Diego, it was built with two main spires, but unique to this temple are four smaller spires at the base of each main spire. (Information From Wikipedia)

temples.name: Laie Hawaii Temple
temples.address: 55-600 Naniloa Loop Laie HI 96762-2202 United States
temples.services: Clothing rental available No cafeteria available No patron housing available Distribution center nearby
temples.history: Laie Hawaii Temple is a temple of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church) located on the northeast shore of the Hawaiian island of Oʻahu. A half-mile from the Pacific Ocean, in the town of Lāʻie. The Laie Hawaii Temple plays an important role in the town of Lā'ie,[4] with the Visitors' Center attracting more than 100,000 people annually. (Information from Wikipedia)
